mapper.select: select CASE WHEN count(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END from t_flink_app where team_id = #{teamId} limit 1
select CASE WHEN count(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END from t_flink_app where job_name = #{jobName} limit 1
SELECT CASE WHEN count(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM t_flink_app WHERE flink_cluster_id = #{clusterId} limit 1
select CASE WHEN count(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END from t_flink_app where flink_cluster_id = #{clusterId} and state = 5 limit 1
select t.*, p.name as projectName from t_flink_app t left join t_flink_project p on t.project_id = p.id where t.id = #{application.id}
mapper.update:
update t_flink_app
job_id=#{application.jobId},
tracking=#{application.tracking},
option_state=#{application.optionState},
start_time=#{application.startTime},
end_time=#{application.endTime},
duration=#{application.duration},
state=#{application.state},
total_tm=null, total_slot=null, total_task=null, available_slot=null, jm_memory=null, tm_memory=null,
total_tm=#{application.totalTM},
total_slot=#{application.totalSlot},
total_task=#{application.totalTask},
available_slot=#{application.availableSlot},
jm_memory=#{application.jmMemory},
tm_memory=#{application.tmMemory},

mapper.select: select t.*, u.username, case when trim(u.nick_name) = '' then u.username else u.nick_name end as nick_name from t_flink_app t inner join t_user u on t.user_id = u.user_id where t.team_id=#{teamId}
mapper.update:
update t_flink_app
cluster_id=#{application.clusterId},
job_id=#{application.jobId},
end_time=null, state=14, tracking=1
where id=#{application.id}
mapper.select: select k8s_pod_template from ( select k8s_pod_template, max(create_time) as ct from t_flink_app where k8s_pod_template is not null and k8s_pod_template !='' and execution_mode = 6 group by k8s_pod_template order by ct desc ) as pt limit #{limitSize}
